item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

speedster239:

I’m not familiar with what a “theif” is.

In the criminal law, theft (also known as stealing) is the illegal taking of another person’s property without that person’s freely-given consent

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

Silver Lining:

There are very few people active in this section that can honestly say they’ve never stolen code. In the second page of this topic, I can see two - Ollie and ruler. Hell, even I have, though I’ve made sure to give proper credit. Don’t get impotent over a bookshelf’s troubles.

I would not say things that you can not back up with evidence.

I know you have used alot of code from Ollie and learned alot. Yet you flame him.

On IRC you have made a complete ass of yourself, talking about where you stand on raw and how all my theories are invalid. When confronted with all the evidence I have you looked foolish.

Recommendation for the IRC channel Access

Heh. As I explained to you, the “raw’s successor” thing was what newbiehacker or someone else dubbed me after my unprofitable pseudo-scam. You are indeed a liar, fabricating and exaggerating things to make it appear as though everyone who ever said a word against you is scum. Few, if any, of your theories are even slightly true. At any rate, it’s worth my hop for this fun.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

I refuse to believe you are anything but a Jew until I see your penis.

Read full topic

/spam.

Illiteracy is a plague.

I’m still pissed off that somebody would just get up and accuse me of stealing people’s work when they have no proof to back their claims. [/quote]

no, no spotlight. theif.[/quote]

I’m not familiar with what a “theif” is.

Back on Topic: I was wondering if there is a field in the client that details the interaction between two entities beyond whether or not they are in combat, ie the trade window or the skills being assisted to another player?
